content.rendered:
Saturday Afternoon Satsang Activities

Pravachan or Spiritual Discourses ♦ Sacred Chants & Recitations ♦ GEOKC Kirtan Heritage ♦ GEOKC Traditional Bhajans ♦ Bhakti Book of Prayers ♦ GEOKC Traditional Worship Ceremony ♦ Preeti Bhoj is not free. It is $12 person.

 

Pravachan or Spiritual Discourses

Coming soon…

Sacred Chants & Recitations

(A recommended practice by Pujya Guruji)

Scriptures and Bhakti Texts of Lord Krishna, Teachings of Gurus and Saints

Oral Tradition of Vedas as Recitation to Chant Vedic Mantras / Hymns:

Vedic Chants:

  • Vedas and Vedic Hymns
  • Bhagavad Gita recitation
  • Bhagavata Purana

Bhakti Book of Prayers

GEOKC Traditional Worship Ceremonies include the following steps:

  • Offering
  • Prarthana
  • Aarti
  • Blessing
  • Holy Prasad

Reading the Sanskri Stotras is Awakening the devotion to God:

Sanskit Stotras:

Prayer Hymns

Sanskrit Stotras by Name:

Krishna-Radha, Narasimha, Lord Vishnu, and more coming.

Preeti Bhoj is not free. It is $12 person.
